EntryName	LCMT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Leucine carboxyl methyltransferase 1 (EC 2.1.1.233) (Protein-leucine O-methyltransferase) ([Phosphatase 2A protein]-leucine-carboxy methyltransferase 1)
GeneName	LCMT1 LCMT CGI-68
Length	357
Function	Methylates the carboxyl group of the C-terminal leucine residue of protein phosphatase 2A catalytic subunits to form alpha-leucine ester residues.
